channel.title: [508]Making 2 Worlds + PVP[508]
channel.description:
Hello, I need help with my source, 508 source, I want to have [b]2 worlds[/b] like some 508 [b]PVP[/b] servers do.
Also I need help with making the worlds a [b]PVP[/b] world and a [b]Non-PVP[/b] world.
I'm not requesting, but a suggestion for helping me, is to find a source that already has this done, and tell me where is is located.
If you can help me, that would be GREAT, thank-you.
- Monkey money30

item.title: [508]Making 2 Worlds + PVP[508]
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

I wouldn’t do that any way, because I want my server to me supported by IP changer, witch you cannot change the PORT with…

I just need a PVP server, like some NEW 508 PVP servers like your in a safe zone in edgeville, then in a PVP zone doing ::pvp…

Like a source that does that - I need some sort of name for this source…

Read full topic
